data.title: Covid-19: from ticking time bomb to mild inconvenience

data.description: Vijit Chao Phraya event runs daily until December 15 as part of Thailand Winter Festival

data.title: Teacher gets 111 years for sexually abusing hundreds of children
data.description: DSI reveals suspect conspired with model agency owner to abuse up to 1,000 minors, recording the crimes in over half a million images

data.title: Thailand’s debt relief plan heads to Cabinet
data.description: Packages will waive interest on NPLs and forgive debt on credit-card and personal loans of less than 5,000 baht

data.title: Thai government poised to forgive credit-card and personal loans of up to 5,000 baht as debt crisis spirals
data.description: Pichai highlights risks and opportunities in upcoming US trade talks set for February

data.title: An exquisite Christmas at InterContinental Bangkok
data.description: Festive afternoon tea, sumptuous meals, and the joy of gift-giving—there are countless ways to celebrate the most wonderful time of the year. Honouring traditions from California to Cantonese, InterContinental Bangkok, recognised as one of Southeast Asia’s Best Hotels in the 2024 Condé Nast Traveller Readers’ Choice Awards UK and a Michelin Guide Key Hotel, embraces the spirit of Christmas with an array of luxurious experiences to share with friends and family.

data.title: OR focused on sustainability as CEO hands over reins
data.description: Disathat Panyarachun signs off by underscoring energy & retail giant’s drive for efficiency, innovation and results

data.title: InterContinental Bangkok celebrates New Year’s with sensational style
data.description: InterContinental Bangkok, recognised as one of the Best Hotels in Southeast Asia at the 2024 Condé Nast Traveller Readers’ Choice Awards UK and a Michelin Guide Key Hotel, stands as the ultimate year-end celebration destination in the heart of Bangkok. Revellers can indulge in a curated collection of experiences, from multi-course fine dining to poolside parties beneath a sky ablaze with fireworks.

data.title: GPSC eyes investing in small nuclear reactors
data.description: PTT subsidiary sets out to generate electricity through renewables as it aims to achieve net zero by 2060

data.title: Mystery surrounds deaths of five workers at Phetchabun factory
data.description: Cause of death of workers at fermented fish factory will be determined at autopsy, local police chief says

data.title: The ultimate pre-Christmas treats!
data.description: It’s that time of the year again, when festive afternoon teas are being rolled out to ensure we get ourselves into the mood for Christmas. Guru picks our top twelve, in no particular order.

data.title: Former Pheu Thai spokesman critical after shooting
data.description: Sakda Noppasith, 61, is in a critical after being shot in the early hours of Tuesday morning at a Chonburi restaurant

data.title: AMCHAM hosts Minister of Commerce for Member Luncheon
data.description: The American Chamber of Commerce in Thailand (AMCHAM) welcomed Pichai Naripthaphan, Minister of Commerce, as the honoured guest at its Member Luncheon, where he shared insights into Thailand's trade and economic strategy.

data.title: 52-year-old man from S’pore dies after getting a massage in Phuket
data.description: A man from Singapore died after a visit to a massage parlour in Phuket on Dec 7.

data.title: AMCHAM Hosts Minister of Commerce H.E. Pichai Naripthaphan for Member Luncheon
data.description: Bangkok, December 9, 2024 – The American Chamber of Commerce in Thailand (AMCHAM) welcomed H.E. Pichai Naripthaphan, Minister of Commerce, as the honoured guest at its Member Luncheon, where he shared insights into Thailand's trade and economic strategy.

data.description: A man from Singapore died after a visit to a massage parlour in Phuket on Dec 7.

data.title: Artist explores possibilities in the abstract
data.description: Art lovers are invited to explore the liminal space between paintings and sculptures during "(Brackets)" which is running at SAC Gallery until Jan 11.

data.title: Visit Uzbekistan with Siam Society
data.description: Siam Society is holding a study trip to Uzbekistan, a fascinating country in Central Asia, from March 14-23.

data.title: Thoughts turn to dust
data.description: Since the expansion of corn cultivation for animal feed in the region, Thailand, Myanmar and Laos have been negatively impacted by the increasing severity of PM2.5 pollution in the northern region.

data.title: Remembering J-pop star Miporin, found dead at 54
data.description: Miho Nakayama, the celebrated Japanese actress and singer renowned for her iconic performance in the 1995 romantic masterpiece Love Letter, has passed away at the age of 54. Her body was discovered at her home in Tokyo

data.title: SAM Engineering Marks Significant Milestone with Aerospace and Semiconductor Expansion in Thailand
data.description: SAM Engineering & Equipment (M) Berhad (SAMEE) has celebrated a pivotal moment in its strategic expansion, officially opening two factories and breaking ground on a third facility in Ban Bueng, Chonburi, highlighting its growing capabilities in aerospace and semiconductor equipment manufacturing.

data.title: Thai local mats featured in Dior Gold House
data.description: Blending traditional craftsmanship with modern luxury, Chanthaburi’s renowned handwoven mats have been reimagined in stylish designs showcased at Dior Gold House, a new high-end destination in Bangkok.

data.title: Art highlights at Jim Thompson Farm
data.description: The milder weather brings with it every year many floral festivals and events where you can get in touch with nature. But if you want to get in touch with nature and appreciate art in one go, Art On Farm at the Jim Thompson Farm Tour, which runs until Jan 1, should be the one stone that kills two birds.

data.title: Court delays Khao Kradong hearing pending amendments to complaint
data.description: The court has postponed the hearing against nine Interior Ministry officials to January 28, giving the plaintiff time to amend charges

data.title: Concerns grow over nationwide wage hike amid economic uncertainty
data.description: Thai agencies issue caution over nationwide 400 baht wage increase, citing concerns about economic impacts and risk to recovery

data.title: Five issues for Paetongtarn government
data.description: Government set to present its progress after three months in office on December 12

data.title: How to book a tailoring session in Bangkok during your vacation
data.description: Bangkok is one of the best destinations in the world for custom tailoring, offering affordable prices, expert craftsmanship, and fast service. However, booking a tailoring session during a short vacation can seem challenging if you're unfamiliar with the process.

data.title: Police bust secret society drug bash on Sukhumvit, 124 arrested
data.description: The raid was only possible due to tip-offs, police say, adding that the secret society regularly organised such events through Instagram

data.title: Korat doctor warns people in five risk groups against massage therapy
data.description: Warning follows death of woman in Udon Thani related to Thai traditional massage

data.title: Naked ambition: Russian tourist’s ambitious swim results in rescue
data.description: The tourist’s midnight swim took a wild turn when he was found naked and exhausted, drifting halfway between Pattaya and Koh Lan

data.title: Royal Enfield strengthens commitment to APAC region with the inauguration of new assembly plant in Thailand
data.description: Bangkok, December 04, 2024:: Royal Enfield, global leader in mid-size (250cc-750cc) motorcycle segment, today began a new chapter in its journey in the Asia Pacific region, with the commencement of operations of its new CKD(Completely Knocked down) assembly facility in Thailand.

data.title: Central Chidlom’s grand renovation | The Nation in Brief
data.description: Central Chidlom’s grand renovation is more than just a facelift—it’s a masterclass in retail strategy. As Thailand’s most consistently high-performing department store, Central Chidlom's transformation is poised to reinforce its status as a world-class luxury destination.

data.title: Starbucks Reserve™  One Bangkok | The Nation Lifestyle
data.description: Today, we’re thrilled to present the unveiling of Starbucks' newest Flagship Store and its largest Greener Store at One Bangkok, a prestigious location in the heart of the city.

data.title: Contractor loses millions for abandoning Trang terminal project
data.description: Airports Department seizes 53-million-baht security deposit after contractor abandons construction, will search for a replacement soon to meet March deadline

data.title: Mitr Phol Group recognized with the Human Rights Award for the 5th consecutive year
data.description: Highlighting its commitment to conducting business in alignment with international human rights principles

data.title: Booming industries, skills gaps sparking Thai talent war: survey
data.description: Annual salary survey by Robert Walters says demand is highest in food manufacturing, fast-moving consumer goods, and automotive sectors

data.title: Bangkok’s latest green lung unveiled at govt complex festival
